name: CLTSaleContract

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Token
@dev API interface for interacting with the DSGT contract
attributes.name: Token

attributes.documentation:
Fallback function
     * @dev This function will be called whenever anyone sends funds to a contract,
throws if the sale isn't Active or the sale minimum isn't met
@dev Change the price during the different rounds
attributes.name: changeRate

attributes.documentation: @dev Ends the sale, once ended can't be reopened again
attributes.name: endSale

attributes.documentation: @dev Makes the sale dormant, no deposits are allowed
attributes.name: pauseSale

attributes.documentation: @dev Makes the sale active, thus funds can be received
attributes.name: openSale

attributes.documentation: @notice Terminate contract and send any ETH left in contract to owner
attributes.name: destroyContract
